message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $200. I think you'll find it's a great deal for its quality.
I'm interested in the product, but $200 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $120?
I appreciate your interest, Bob. While $200 represents the value of the product, I'm willing to come down to $180. This would be a fair compromise.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit far from the price I'm comfortable with. Would you be willing to meet me at $140?
